text: The Apollo missions landed on the moon between 1969 and 1972. They brought back lunar rocks and samples.
reference_summary: The Apollo program landed on the moon and collected samples between 1969 and 1972.

text: Large language models are deep learning architectures trained on vast amounts of text. They can generate coherent language and answer questions.
reference_summary: LLMs generate language and answer questions, trained on lots of text.

text: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications made of various materials, generally built along an east-to-west line across the historical northern borders of China.
reference_summary: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications along China's northern borders.

text: Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants use sunlight to synthesize foods with carbon dioxide and water.
reference_summary: Photosynthesis allows plants to convert sunlight into food using carbon dioxide and water.

text: The Internet of Things (IoT) refers to the network of physical objects embedded with sensors, software, and other technologies to connect and exchange data with other devices and systems over the internet.
reference_summary: IoT involves connecting physical objects embedded with technology to exchange data over the internet.

text: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its easy syntax and versatility. It's widely used in web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and scientific computing.
reference_summary: Python is an easy-to-learn programming language used in various fields like web development and AI.

text: Climate change is a long-term alteration in Earth's climate, caused by human activities and natural processes. It leads to global warming, sea-level rise, and extreme weather conditions.
reference_summary: Climate change causes global warming and extreme weather due to human activities and natural processes.

text: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. Completed in 1889, it is one of the most recognizable structures in the world and attracts millions of visitors annually.
reference_summary: The Eiffel Tower is a famous lattice tower in Paris, completed in 1889, attracting millions annually.
